malbonkabalenkosi mphulaphulasekhaya hlala kuye ahlale kuwe
malbonkabalenkosi sithipha eblu bangabuhlala kuwe s namazwi akhe ahlala kuye mphulaphulwasekhaya uya hlonipheka uya hlonitshwe mimoya uyothwena aphuhamba khona ingelosi ziyaleziwe okuthizize s zikugade mphulaphulwasekhaya botinb nasiphini sabatha esibekiwe sabekelwa wena
asoze sibe namandla akuphumelela ngoba wena izithepsi zakho ziodarishwa ngabaphezulu madabangabalekozo
ubona singagu[_q]inje mphulaphulwasekhaya kwabaphantsi ngobathina sinophezulu madabangabalekozo
owalehluli thuna osimele zulini mphulaphula sekhaya ithiphapile [_x]a ifundaba ngoko aniseengabasemzini nabaphambukele kuyo yona le nto yobun[_c]welethina bazalwane singabantwana sate ngwangegazi malbongabalinkosi awuya noolonga vizitaze malbongabalinkosi amasingabendlu kathi[_x]o sakhilelwaphezwe siseko sabaprofeti ne sabapostolo uthike iingukhlethu ngokweyakhe ilitye lembom ngamanyamazwi elilitye esibekwe phezwalo lasisiseko esisakhelwe kwisiseko esinguyesukhletho baphulaphula sekhaya s asiguniswa ke yonkinto eyakhele kuye ayigunga zingagungintaba angagungamawa zingagungazonkizito kodwa yesukhletho bazalwa umile ngonaphakade sakhele peswakhe malibongabalekosi uphetyizeliswa ukhaliswa intoni ke mphulaphula sekhaya

imihla emithe mphulaphuli iwasekhaya malibonkeka iga malenkosi ubungethandi nanawe okuthi uthi[_x]o ea libonkakhama lenkosi elungiselela abantu izithene nawe ubeyipathi abantu abalungiselelwa ekude kwitafile phambi kwezitha ubungethandi ukuthi nawe ubengomnye wabantu abadekelwa letafile pambi kwentshaba mphulaphulwasekhaya malibonkama lenkosi zi uhle uhle zijongile ungakuthandazeli ukufakwazo ngoba ukufane uthandazeli ukufakwazo alizuzaliseka izwi elilikathi[_x]o kanti izwi likathi[_x]o kumele lizalisekile baphulaphuli bezwilikathi[_x]o kumele izwi likathi[_x]o lizalisekile alikwazi ke ukwenze[_c]a [_x]aangaba wena uzauthintsha bazakho funa zingayiboni yonkeweni nto yenzelwa nguthi[_x]o funa zingabono buhle uthi[_x]o kwenzelabona malibonga malenkosi
funazife weenentshaba lingafikanga i[_x]esha lobabone kuthuthi[_x]o imin[_q]weno yabo emibingakuwe uthi[_x]o kayivanga kodwa uthi[_x]o ukumamele [_c]aawe nauke wamenza umaluswakhe wahlala kuwe malibonga malenkosi zathi promisi zonke
apromisingayo angazo abangwele wabanazo ukuzifumana uthike uhalungiselelwa isithebe malibonga malenkosi kwadina ngama[_x]esha mabi apho khona khona ukulimala phezi komhlaba izinto zifike zinobungozi kodawena wathi inobandihamba emfleni wethunzi lokufa andiiko yikakubi kodwa uyawuhlala kuthi[_x]o enkosi ke mpulaphulwa sikhaya uthi[_x]o wo[_x]o lwakusikelela kaphathek akuhle benobomobumnandi obuhlambululeyo obunamathamsan[_q]a uthi[_x]o benawo akusikelele ngeentsikelelo zonke sitya siphindesitibane kwi[_x]eshelela kothi bless you amen

sakesa[_c]etyiswa ngobamasenzentoni ngoba umyeni uyeza malibongaba elinkosi inye ke bazalwanito efuneka umntu ayenze kukuvuma ngomlomo zamaroma ten ndizauthanda ke bathandi ukutshisifunde kwin[_c]wadi zethu zeginesisi utshapta s igenesisiwe sawufunda kuyo utshapta eitini alibonga malinkosi sisawufunda kodwa ndiyathandi kutimhlamba kisifunde kakhulwana ebifozi s fikekekelinda uyeshloko sethu sizawuthetha ngasophaku v12 apho isithi usara wahleka s iikamelenkosi masfundenu sarra uhleka [_x]abekutheni sesivela kwindawo ethi
eusara wahleka empeleni nawe mpulaphulendinayo into ethi nawe uba yayinguwe uwawunokuhleka ngoba isithunywa sikathi[_x]o safika sizomhlekisa uthi[_x]o ngoba bathandekayo uthi[_x]o emva kweentlungu emva kwen[_c]waleko emvakntu kuthi[_x]o uyakwazi ukuthi ahambe ahambe afike emntwini ezomhlekisa akukhathaliseki impulaphuli noba umhlekisa ngabantwana bakhe kodwa uthi[_x]o uiamhlekiso mntundi yathanda nawe mpulaphulasekhakukhazela le ntukuthi uyaz k [_x]e kuthunyaka u[_q]alauthi[_x]o uzakuhlekisa kulonyaka malbongwe ke igama lenkosi baphulaphuli basekhandi[_c]ella ke ukulifunda ke izwi likathi[_x]o njengokombaliwe kuleen[_c]wadi ekagenezisi [_c]hapter 18 siza ofundas[_q]alipha e[_q]aleni esive ukuthi lithini izilikathi[_x]o phaya ishloko phaya na[_x]authiyawaphakamisa amehlo akhe wabona nango amadoda amathathu eemingakuye wabona wakidima eyakwakhawulela esuka emnyango wentente wa[_q]obutha emnyango wathi s bafundeni futhi wathi
nkosi yam ukubakalokundi babalwe nguwe musa ukudlula umke kumkhonzi wakho makhe ukuthatyathwe iintwana yamanzi nihlambe inyawoze noning[_q]en[_q]e phantsi komthi lo ndithabathe i[_q]hekeza lesonka nikhase intlijiozenu kamva nodlula kubanize kudlula ngenkayoko kumkhonziweni athi yenza ngoko uthetha ngako wakhawuleza wakhawuleza abramwaya
ententeni kusara wathi khawuleza ovole esela ezintathu zomgubo o[_c]oliweyo wenze ama[_x]heke ema[_x]ebenkwana ezonka wakithi mawaya s ezinkomeni wabramwatha abathayithole lenkomo lithambili lilungile

adla athi kuphina usara umkakho
wathi nanko ententeni yathindi yakubuyela lakubuya eli[_x]esha yabona usara umkakho uya kubanonyana weva usara esemnyango wentente wona emvakwayo ke kaloku abram nozara babesebekhulile s bekhuluphele sebekhulile kusekun[_q]amkile kusara okwendlela yabafazi
sara wahleka ngaphakathi kwakhe esithi emva kokuba ndihagela ndisaya kuyolulelwa na neekosiya yaluphele nje wathi uyehova kabram yini na ukuba usara ahleke esithi kuhleliwe nje ndiyakuzala na naluphele nje mna kukho na into emn[_q]abeleyo na uyehova nge[_x]esha elimisiweyo ndiyakubuyela kuwe lakubuya eli[_x]esha usara abenonyana wakhanela usara esithi anihleka ngakuba ebesoyika wathiena hayi uhlekile malbongwe ke bazalwane igama lenkosi apho ke ishloko sathi ke usara wahleka usara uhlekiswa zizithunywa zezul kukuthetha kukathi[_x]o alibonkaba lenkosi koba uthi[_x]o uthetha into estrange ngakhange wakhe wayilindela usara uba ingathethwa emva kweminyaka usara usara ekhangela umntwana engamfumane naku ekwaluphaleni kwakhe sen[_c]amile alibongabalenkosi ngoba uthi[_x]o uya kwazi uya vama kusebenzisi[_x]esha abantu aban[_c]wamengalo ibekli[_x]esha yena a[_q]alangalo izinto ngoba unguthi[_x]o izinto zakhe ziphambene nezinto zethu unguthi[_x]o onga[_c]akwa onguthi[_x]o onguthi[_x]o onobubele obalainwele zethu osifunzayo s ogrokisayo izibele zakhe zanele wonkeke umhlaba uthi[_x]o lona baphulaphuli basekhaya nali izwi likathi[_x]o kufika izithunywa ezithathu kule ndodakthwa s u abrahama albonkabalenkosi ameni albonkabalenkosi kubonakala iintokokubana s s s s s s s okungenzeki ebantwini kuye uthi[_x]o kuyenzeka uyayibuyisela iminyaka uthi[_x]o alibongamas abram uba mamamele labathatha bethetha s enomyeni lenkoskazi bamamele bethetha nomyenwayo imemnyango iyeva okukutshintshana kwemeseji yenkoskazi yomyeni kunye nezithunywa iimamele nendawo ethi umye unkazwakho ngal[_x]esha kunyakuzayo uyawebe etetile enomntwijweni akho kuthi hayhi[_x]o s onguthi[_x]o weminyaka iminyaka yenzwanguye akalawulwa yiminyaka onguthi[_x]o wayo neminyaka njengoba enguthi[_x]o wesabatha ayo sabatha erana yena yena urana isabatha alibongwikhama lenkosi

ku[_x]inseleyo siyakwi hlosi watsho mvundla ndiyoyi kamna yatsho ibhokho bandana bam ndithembe ndile[_c]ebo elihle watsho mfundla e[_q]ibeleni kebandwana bam oo basondela kumlambo lowo nalo ihlosilimile esidikidekeni somhlaba ulapho
unkuba wen sentoni apha wen wabuza mfundla ndi ngumnumza nawuhlosi lindele ukuseza nabhokhwe senze isivumelwano nawe khaundi[_c]hazele ukuba ongubanikanye kanye
latsho ihlosa ndinguhlele umvundla kwaye ndithunyiwe uyokwenza umsebenzo balekileyo
yinkosenkulu usingewe wobukumkani bamafrika onke undithumile ukubandizokilanda izikhumba izilishumi zamahlosi njengesipho senkosikazi yakhe entla ndinethamsan[_q]a ukudibana nawe isikomba s singenza umsisebenzi omkhulu omhle
watsho mfundla bantona bam umvundla ke watha bathawusebalwakhe lokubhala kunyenephepha wa[_q]ansa ukubhala s sikhumba sakho esu[_q]ala esihle esikhulu watsho mfundla wema ke umvundla wajonga ngokwihlosi webonakala njongokuba wenza umlinganiselo sikhumba asifunayo
hayi hayi wundla nabaleka kangangoko linakho ihlosi bandona bam li[_c]ebo elikhle kakhulu eli ulenzileyo mvundla wenzeka kuhle kakhulu usindise ubombam
lingakubulele kantoni ndisenza ubuntu iibonendlela ibalekengala uhlosi soze uphinofumane nenye ingakikwihlosi ndiyaku[_x]elela ndiyabulela kakhulu mvundla undin[_c]edile usale kamnandi
umvundla kibandana mamothathamn[_q]waziwakhe onentsiba wavovakakhlu wambasole kukuhle nawe bokho endia[_q]ulela nangokubasidibene sabazihlobo

ibhokokibandona bam yabagude[_x]elilele kodwa ke yayintle ityebile yawubulela umvundla ngeendlela engazenzisiyo

bolezeni ekupepha nasempumakoloni ebayi iherald maspinesibene kwakhona kibantwana bam kwi[_x]esha elizayo ndiyanithanda
manibulise kwakhona bomuntuzebamka lentsasaya namhlanje unalibali uphindewakho nakaloko nomathatholowenu sondelani nisiboleke indlebe
beneyazi ukuba ilizwe lizelezizinto ezintle ezimnandi kweke linizinto ezimnande zisanelayo sonke
ngodwa ke umdu[_x]a enezintezininzi makabelani nomnye ukuba ke kukho onwamona asinakho ukwanela sonke phulaphilani ke ukuba kwanzekeantoni kwelibali lithi ndiyaku[_q]ela sele khaundiselele kubeganye
ngenye imini ke kwakushushu bantonabamu kushu shukakhulu ndithi iimluvu zazishizimizimba ngamanzi zisibenswami boku yazo kwakushushu kakhulu kibandona bam ukuba ihlosilona lalifakenzwana iminyeni umnye omkhulu ozele ngamanzi lalisethi lingapha libe lingapha oh siyabulela kisi[_q]apho siziva sipholile [_x]aafumene kuphola ke ubomi bubamnandi kodwa lona iselebandwele bam lalingamela likwaphela nobu[_c]hushu
laselekebandwele bam iseleamanzi kwi[_c]hibi ayimnandi
s laa se laa laa se lasela laphela i[_c]idi kola ke zange isela liphelele apho
lazela kutribe landelayo nditsho nomlanjana um[_c]ing[_c]uwa ulapho lasele isela
kodwa ke lalunga mphele un[_q]aloole sale laa sela abandwana bam laa sela ladikelafuna namanzi eklungunyomkhulu kunye nomlampu
lasela emadamenditsho nama[_c]hibe inamanzi amahle anombalwe isibhakabhaka aphela amanzi alo
kora ke bantwana bam lalikhusela ulwandle isel elizangeli wasela manzolwandle kubakalokwona ayinetyuaiseleke elingayithandi n[_c]asa yawo zangizonwabeke ezinyezilwanyana bantona bam iingwenyakezona zazirh[_q]ukele
izinto zibanzi ngokubanzima zonke kaloku sifuna amanzi zonke kezi lwanyana zahlangana phantsi komthi omkhulu zeshwabula
za[_q]umaka kuwa ulu zaraba zadikeza vumelela kwinto enye
kwakumeleke banyazele iselwe kubalivule umlomawalo ukuze aphume amanzi ingabaloo nto izakwezekanjani
niyabona ndizakuli yala ngaman[_q]ina amngoku isela yathrho engonyama liyakuthi [_x]alitswini okanye likhala kubandlityhalile kulapho yakuphuma khona amanzi kora ke koba liyishwa nangolayisele lalisela likhukumeleli likhulu ngoku lalimitsimikhulu kunangaphambili yasilingonyamaonyama kayikhuba inzipho nalomang[_q]inaayo

diza[_q]abamisake sibesinye ukuze ndithemise iselengaso lya kuthi[_q]ali vulamlomu li[_x]hume lisisinambuzane
akhablezamanzii abume ngaphandle lathwayi lovani bandona bam korwe iselela lizeleka abanzi zangelibe nalune thuba lokutshoka esinabuzane eso
kwenyanzeleka ke ilovani liphine lisitye ngokwano esinabuzane eso yazeyoneengwenye yezenezebo elikezayo
koraka bantona bam abazangi babe nethamsani isela lizange liphulaphule alizange lijongenak[_q]anye kwingwenye ngelo eshayibalisayo
niyabona ke na zakulungisa le nto watsho nomyayi nebola ke ndizakuzamukuli[_q]hula ndihleke isengendlela elimpinelitye ngayo ngamanzajwele ngaphakatikulo

sisazi ukubalowo wayivusayo s inkosi uyesu uya kusivusa nathi ngoyeso asimise phambi kwakhe ndawonye nani kuba konke oko kungen[_c]ayeno ukuze luthi ubabalo lwakubalwandile s ngabona abaninzi luphuphumise umbulelo use s ekuzukiseni uthi[_x]o na uvested in again sinawonjike kwalowo moya wokholo ngokoko kubhaliwe kwathiwa ndakholwa kungoko ndathethayo naathike siyakholwa kungokosithethayo nokuthetha now kubhaliwe kwathiwa bakholwa okanye ndakholwa ndathetha now uthi[_x]o ku[_q]ala ezibenditshilo s naklevempheleyo kanye kusakuloklom[_q]a s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s s sholo leendophaya athink ukunk[_c]wadi kaluka ubandiphazami kusasahluko seshumi elinesbozo ithi iibani nokholo lukathi[_x]o s kunohlobo lokolo lukathi[_x]o
hlobo lunjano olu sizawu yaphakulo phaya kulan[_c]wadi yabaseroma isahluko sesine but bifosi yofika phaya na uhlobo olu lokholo lolu luthethayo le nto aye athinye umntu ukuve kuthwe ubanu nomlomombi [_x]a ethetha izinto ziyenzeka so s lo mntu unokholo lusrongo bad uli sebensangendlele kwen[_c]a ngokuba uthethi zintwezi kwen[_c]a okanye ezizimbi zitsho zenzeka iimajini [_x]a eno[_c]alisathethi zintwezilungileyo ezerayiti kungathumlomo wakhuswiti oomnandi ngobindayithethayo uithetha yenzeke

nankom[_c]a omdekewe nwenya zisenza umngelele ziphumanganyeganye emanzanzini zipendulango kuvungama zisabela ubizwe oluvela kwinkosiyazo ngokawulezakhe umlamba wazala zingwenya lithuba lam ngoku nanko esiya eshukumisa umsila wakhe omde onwabile ndiyokubake[_x]uma[_q]uma emvakongwenya yu[_q]ala wa[_q]alisa ke ukubala nye mini ntathu
yindlela wayikhwaza i[_x]uma[_q]uma esukakungwenyayi[_q]ala esiya kwilandelayo ne ndandathu si[_x]en[_x]i
wabala ke bantwana bam watsibatsiba wabala watsibatsiba wasondela ngokusondela kubu[_q]ebesi[_q]iti waruki amashumi asithoba anesipozo amashumi asithoba anesithoba liikhulu uharuki wafikelelake kwingwenye ug[_q]abela isanti yobu[_q]e besi[_q]ithi yayiphabi kwakhe wa[_x]uma[_q]uma ebhekaphezulu emoyeni wakhwaza kakhulu ha haa dini[_q]athile nonk enidenzele iblokho yokubandisuka kweslamis[_q]ethi
dizokufika kumphambi nobu[_q]ebesi[_q]ethi yathi ingwenyakeyo g[_q]ibela yakuevalomazwi yagu[_q]uka
fikelela kwisandi obu[_q]ebes[_q]eti ephilile wag[_q]uka ejongo msila wakhe omde omhlophe ofukufukuba ndwana bam wabe ungekho endaliniyalowo ke kwasala omfutshane nawokekodwa ufukufuku akazange akhathale uharoke kubakalokelahlekelongumsilawakhe kuba ebele ingozi
wabangumfundla ke oonwabileyo e[_q]ibilekewa yekhulekile kukusisa lomini ke bantonabam yonke imivundla elapho yaba yekhulekileyo kwayeke uksisalo mini yonke imivundla yabanemisela emifutshane njengoharugilo yiloo nto ke ngokimivundla [_x]aibona inemisila emifutshane
ngokiesfikelele sphelwentsibalethu lanamhlanje akunyanzilekanga ukuba usolokowulinda unalibali kumathotholo wakzi ukuzofundela bantwalabakho okanye bazifundele ndondela ke unalibali dotmobile kwimfonifono yakho ephathwayo
nantsi ke idilesi naliibali dotmobile ungalifumanakene u[_x]abangelwa amabala mnandi nemidlalwe nalibali kwezindawo zilandelayo
ngolesibini kweepdispat[_c]h empomagoloni kantiike ngolwezine ebayi kwiphabali heraldi siphinesibone kwa khona kwi[_x]esha elizayo
s molunonke emakhaya ngalintsasa li[_q]eshi lokubakisi hlanga nekwakhona siphulaphule yink[_q]ubo entra ethi nali ibali elibalikesi [_q]alangalo namhlanje libali lomsila weharuke iharuke bantabam yayingumvundla wayihlala ekwisig[_q]ithe sithile esasengongwe ngamanzi ukuba kawuzange weva ngomvundla unge[_x]hali
oo uyabaleka ngokakhawuleza njengemoto ibaleka idolophini okanye stela twini
kuthi wakhe kudangala kwakukho mvundla wayibiza ukubangu haruki ngaloo ma[_x]esha ke yonke imivundla emihle inemisila emhlophe imide kwaye ke ifukufuku ngenyekeyimini bantona bam uharuki wayunwabile esivakamnandi evuya
ebhekisa umsila wakhe ngasemva nangaphambili yonkeke imivundla ihlalesi[_q]ithini phakathina phakathikomlambomkhoo
kokurhoke ingwenya ezimnints ezilambilezi luhlaza zonkeke zazithanda ukutyamivundla emnandi kwisidlosasu sa[_x]asa kwisasemini nakwisidlo sasebusoku
yonkeke imihla phamukwesidlisakusasaro[_q]o nesepisi kuphamukuba kwikulalwe bonke oomama bayimivundla
bagasolokekebi yala be[_c]hazila bantwana babokuba balumke umama kaharoki ke soloke esithi kuya hamdela kude kunasisantini
ndithetha ngezangwenyazinkul eziluhlaza ezilambileyo kuba kebantwana bamoharoki kunye neminyemivundle ming[_c]inane bephulaphule abazalibabo bhabonwabile dehleka kumnandi
babedlala kebezimela ngaphantsi kwemithi bahlukumise imisilayabo bebekisa ngapha nangapha
iti isemva ibe ingaphambili babirwapiliza iing[_c]akunyenentyatyambe zikhulayo aphis[_q]ethini ngethuba kaloku bedlala bebonke
korwa yena uharokiwakhu la whamkhulu
wanomdla ukwizibona esenzezinyazinti zinikisa umdla inakuba kumnandi kwekonomdla kwenzikakananyi kubu[_q]ebes[_q]ithi watho uharuki inakuba kukweyisinti ezimnandi zokudlala kwenyezenye izilwanyana ezimiiiintsi ezinikisa umdla endinokudlala nazo ngelinye kibandana bambilanga uharuki waza ne[_c]ebiso linomdla oyonwabile kakhulu umsulawakhe omde walshukuma oko ubeka ngapha nangapha nangapha [_q]ashisela inakuba into s wabuza kibandana bambi slobozakhe ekelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelelehlanjenye imini eyiphi imeni haruki namhlanjenye imini ndizakwele umlambu ndekubu[_q]e bes[_q]ithi awukwazi hayi suku yenza loo nto abahlobo bakhe bomjenga
khumla izinto oomabethwa basi[_c]hazela zona ro[_q]o lalakude kunas esantini ungayi kumlambo unamanza ngamileyo
hambelakude kwisi[_x]hagamfulesi namazinyo abukhali iingwenye eziluhlaza ezinkule zilambileyo
bonkika bahlobo bakhe bakhwaza nga[_x]eshanye bethetanaye babezama kumng[_q]andakuba anga[_q]obi kumlambo unamanzangwamileyo kodwa uharoke kazanga akhathale uyayazukuba asinali ilungelo

kaloku tshabo ingonyama iboniwe aphakledo lophiyethu kubsokuba izolo

yadshwe in[_c]ethe bantona bam kodwa ke kumele nam dilifumane ithuba njengabobonke abanye
oh ngulungileke watsho ukwazi bantona bam masime nokupiswa nokhe zonkeke iintaka zalithanda elo[_c]ebo
zag[_q]iba kolokuba emvakusoku lu[_q][_q]ala kanyangayipheela ilangaseleli [_c]okumise iintaba iziphakamileyo

kolwa lonawukhozi lalu[_x]akekile lujonga ilanga alizange livenanye into

ukuze [_x]a ilangali vele ndiwafake kwakhona i[_q]lu ndiwathunge kumnyama ngokubandi ngabona mandiheke kusasakibandwana bam wamba umkandi wezihlangu esiya kwindawu yakuyokusebenzela wahlala phantsi iibhankeni ngethubalona ilangalivela wange bayintanyo ngozakhe wazideka ke aba empumleni wa[_q]alisa kukuthonga ezinye izihlangu ezihle
oww wakhuza ke umkandiwezihlangu bantonabam wa kula intanyonga wanyikinyamehlo akhe
waphinwasi buisela kwakhona intanyongozaki zamehlo wajonga izihlangu zihle ezibuka waphamisa isihlamgaseni isandlinsakhe
wasijonga ngobunonomoma[_c]ala onke ezintzoma oh inokuba enzekanjanele nto wabuza utata s
s ndo mh isa izokubona kwenzeleko mama wabi zeenkosikazi yakhe walahlo mtshaelo ezibaleke umama wamaangaliso nayonkoskazi wakhe ooo umangaliso ungaka wathu onkosikasi
imithungo imihleka ngaka wathu utata inokuba kubani tata wenze izihlangu izihleka ngaka
babuza na ke wababini umkhaantwezihlangu ke yena wobaleka wayedolophini yokuthenkise izihlangu kumadoda zityebi
umkhaantwezihlanga ke bantona bam wobanakho okuthenga ulunyawufele ukenza ezinye zihlangu ukuzi afumane isidlo asesibsuku enzo kesidlo sebisoku wazithethelela isithi uyabona ngoku ndiza kusikufeli ukuzendenza ezinyezihlangu ndizi[_q]ibezele kusasa kwadike kwakusantshe ngesikhele wayakwindawuyakuyo yokusebenenzela umkhandwesihlangu wophinda bantwana bam womangaliswa kakhona
sitha ndosam kukho izihlangu zimbine zihle apha wavuya kakhurke unkosikazi wakhe wamba umkhandwesihlangu bantwana bam wayedolophini
wathengise izihlangu wazwathenga ufelelwini nzi wazeke watheka nokutya ukuzakubag[_c]ina ivekiyonke
oku akubam nandi ngokubandela bam ro[_q]oke ngobusoku umkhaantwezihlangwa iseka isi[_q]uengasofeli asishiye kubhankaleyo
kwiintsasa ke nganywe wayifumana ipero ezimbeni nezintathu zesihlangu ezintsha
uyabona ngoku dino mhlo kwase imfihlelwe zesihlangu watsho umkhaantwezihlangu bantona bam kumele senzambulela kubantufihlelwe zihlangu watsho umkhantu ezihlangu bantona bam kumele senzombulela kubantu abazenzayo ezihlangu
mnatata ndifunukwazi ukuba ezihlangu zizangemilingona uyabona nkos kazi ukubasizimela emva kwikhabathi sakwazi ukubangubani ozenzayo ebusuku ezihlangu
bavumelana kebantona bam umkhantu ehlanke kuyunyaka nomama
ngobusuku ke obulandelayo bazimela bezolile emvele ngekhabathi kumnyama bathi [_x]a bezakubiwa kuthongo beva ingolo kwangena iintongue festile
atsho amazwi bantbandana bamazolileyo ngoku zenge[_q]alisa latsho linilizwi lisolile
naenkomkhweindwezihlangu neenkosikaziya kibiphuma evokekhaphathi bambona amakhwenka mabini aman[_c]in[_c]i ehleliphantsi emgangathweni
ayin[_c]umilelo makhwenkwe ngethuba isenza izihlangu ayibonakala bandana bam ebetyile impahla zawo zaznemi[_q]hunya emininzi
